fr.gouv.finances.cp.utils.xml.marshal

Interface XmlMarshallable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    NoeudModifiable, XomDefinitionable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionsModel, AttributeModel, BlankModel, ChampModel, CleModel, CollectiviteInfosModel, ComponentModel, ConfigModel, CopyModel, CopyToModel, CritereModel, CritereRefModel, DecoupeModel, DeleteFilterModel, DeleteModel, DocumentModel, DocumentsModel, ElementModel, EnfantModel, EnteteModel, EnvironmentModel, EtatModel, ExportChampModel, ExportElementModel, ExportModel, FilterModel, HelpModel, HiddenModel, IgnoredModel, ImportModel, IndexModel, InputModel, ListeResultatModel, NamespaceModel, NSModel, OptionModel, ParameterModel, ParametersModel, ParentModel, PathModel, PersonnalConfigurationModel, PluginModel, PredicatModel, PropertyModel, RechercheModel, RecherchePaireModel, ReferenceModel, RequiredCritereModel, ResourceModel, ResourceRefModel, RulesModel, SavedRequestsModel, SearchHelperModel, SearchHelperParameterModel, SectionModel, SelectModel, SimpleElement, SourceTargetModel, SpecialKeyEntryModel, SpecialKeyModel, TCriteria, TDocument, TElement, TEtat, TexteModel, TextModel, TKey, TLayer, TPatch, TPersistenceConfig, TraitementExterneModel, TransformModel, TSql, TSqlIndex, TTable, ValueModel, VariableModel, WidgetModel, XemeliosComponentsModel, XPathModel, XsString

    public interface XmlMarshallable
extends java.lang.Cloneable
    Base interface that each tag-associated class must implement.
    WARNING : there is no language-way to force this, but you MUST provide a constructor with this signature :
    public <className> (String tagName) {}

    or instanciation will throw a java.lang.NoSuchMethodException.

    License : LGPL

       throws org.xml.sax.SAXException

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • getAttributes

        XmlMarshallable getAttributes(XmlAttributes attributes)
                       throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        This method is called by the XmlUnMarshaller to allow the model to load its attributes. If the object to construct depends on attributes or anything you can imagine, instanciate what's desired and returns it ; the returned object will be used for next call. In other case, just add return this; to your code.
        Parameters:
        attributes - com.labodev.xml.XmlAttributes
        Returns:
        XmlMarshallable The resulted object.
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - The exception description.

      • getChildToModify

        XmlMarshallable getChildToModify(java.lang.String uri,
                                 java.lang.String localName,
                                 java.lang.String qName,
                                 org.xml.sax.Attributes atts)
        Returns the child of this object that is to be modified by xml reading.
        Parameters:
        uri - The namespace-uri of the child object name
        localName - The child localName
        qName - The child quailfied-name
        atts - The attributes defined in xml file for the child object
        Returns:
        The child found or null

        output - com.labodev.xml.XmlOutputter
